meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7962.

td.p: Anika Gregg, an operations manager from Belmont, Massachusetts
Erich Johnson, a musician and grad student from Brooklyn, New York
Steven Grade, a sports industry consultant from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 4-day cash winnings total $88,300)

tr.td: SHARING THE ISLAND
GAMES WITH DICE
BESTSELLERS
EMMY WINNERS FOR BEST ACTRESS IN A DRAMA
DRINKS ALL AROUND!
7-LETTER WORDS
